title: Google\Cloud\Iot\V1\HttpConfig
name: HttpConfig
description:
The configuration of the HTTP bridge for a device registry.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.iot.v1.HttpConfig

params.name: data.http_enabled_state
params.description: If enabled, allows devices to use DeviceService via the HTTP protocol. Otherwise, any requests to DeviceService will fail for this registry.
